title: Connor Bedard January 16 Preview vs. the Predators | 97.3 The Game
text:
Connor Bedard will be among those on the ice Thursday when his Chicago Blackhawks play the Nashville Predators at Bridgestone Arena. Considering a wager on Bedard in the Blackhawks-Predators matchup? Use our stats and information below.
Bedard leads the Blackhawks with 27 assists and 39 points. With 104 total shots (2.4 per game), Bedard is the leading forward on the Blackhawks in that category.
Watch the NHL, other live sports and more on Fubo. What is Fubo? Fubo is a streaming service that gives you access to your favorite live sports and shows on demand. Use our link to sign up.
Connor Bedard and Blackhawks vs. Predators Info Game Day: Thursday, January 16, 2025 Game Time: 8:00 PM ET TV Channel: ESPN+ Live Stream: Watch this game on ESPN+ Bedard Props vs. Predators Points Prop: Over/Under 0.5 (Over: -162, Under: +126) Assists Prop: Over/Under 0.5 (Over: +126, Under: -162) Recent Bedard Performance He has a goal in 12 of 44 games this season, but no games with more than one goal. Bedard has a point in 25 of 44 games this season, with multiple points in 10 of them. Bedard has an assist in 19 games this year out of 44 games played, including multiple assists seven times.
